p: Moreover, environmentalists are heirs to the legacy of the conservation movement, whose founders were a technocratic and elite group looking to preserve land for their own enjoyment (Taylor 2016). These people were not interested in challenging the capitalist system which had made them wealthy. Instead of mandating that industry clean up its pollution, pay a price on carbon emissions, or create products for reuse and longevity, industry allied environmentalists promoted the view that the captains of industry have no greater responsibility for the ecological crisis than individuals. Instead of making those who create the problem responsible, we blame their victims.
